definition[0]: someone who sleeps in a particular way
note[0]: heavy sleeper (=someone who does not wake easily)
definition[2]: a heavy piece of wood or concrete that supports a railway track
definition[3]: a night train with carriages that have beds for passengers to sleep in
definition[5]: a bed on a train for a passenger to sleep in
definition[6]: a film, book etc which is successful, even though people did not expect it to be
definition[7]: a piece of clothing for a baby that covers its whole body including its feet
definition[8]: a spy who is sent to a particular place and who lives an ordinary life there until a later time, when they begin their spying activities
definition[9]: a share or a product that is not successful immediately, but then suddenly starts to sell well or be successful
example[0]: The movie turned out to be a sleeper.
